Title: Vaya Con Dios
Writer: Darlene Hunt (creator), Jenny Bicks, Dennis Kinski (staff writer)
Actors: Laura Linney, Oliver Platt, Gabriel Basso, John Benjamin Hickey
Plot: Stepping in for the late Joy Kleinman, Paul (Oliver Platt) takes the family to Puerto Rico for his own self help seminar. And as Cathy (Laura Linney) gets some bad news about her cancer ...
